abstract: Zscaler, a new security company by a noted serial entrepreneur, brings Web filtering into the cloud, allowing employers to more easily manage which Web sites workers can visit and what they can download to the corporate network.
snippet: Zscaler, a new security company by a noted serial entrepreneur, brings Web filtering into the cloud, allowing employers to more easily manage which Web sites workers can visit and what they can download to the corporate network.
lead_paragraph: For those of you spending your workdays posting videos of the cat to YouTube or trading messages with friends on Facebook, you’d better start cultivating another pastime.

headline.main: Web Filtering Moves to the Cloud
